<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><Highlight kind="comment">//===- LiveRegMatrix.h - Track register interference ----------&#42;- C++ -&#42;---===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The LiveRegMatrix analysis pass keeps track of virtual register interference</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// along two dimensions: Slot indexes and register units. The matrix is used by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// register allocators to ensure that no interfering virtual registers get</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// assigned to overlapping physical registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Register units are defined in MCRegisterInfo.h, they represent the smallest</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unit of interference when dealing with overlapping physical registers. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// LiveRegMatrix is represented as a LiveIntervalUnion per register unit. When</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a virtual register is assigned to a physical register, the live range for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the virtual register is inserted into the LiveIntervalUnion for each regunit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the physreg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;LIVEREGMATRIX&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;CODEGEN&#95;LIVEREGMATRIX&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Invalidate cached interference queries after modifying virtual register</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// live ranges. Interference checks may return stale information unless</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// caches are invalidated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#a448841a51094959c1ca24de1ae55435f"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#a448841a51094959c1ca24de1ae55435f">invalidateVirtRegs</a>() &#123; ++UserTag; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// No interference, go ahead and assign.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aa58056f4f8345af4ca8bd6e27f0ff8413"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aa58056f4f8345af4ca8bd6e27f0ff8413">IK&#95;Free</a> = 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Virtual register interference. There are interfering virtual registers</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// assigned to PhysReg or its aliases. This interference could be resolved</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// by unassigning those other virtual registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aa30186d61b40f517e8dc5d9e85076a91f"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aa30186d61b40f517e8dc5d9e85076a91f">IK&#95;VirtReg</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Register unit interference. A fixed live range is in the way, typically</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// argument registers for a call. This can&#39;t be resolved by unassigning</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// other virtual registers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aa471b00a6595e7f400ef576512ccbcc31"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aa471b00a6595e7f400ef576512ccbcc31">IK&#95;RegUnit</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// RegMask interference. The live range is crossing an instruction with a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// regmask operand that doesn&#39;t preserve PhysReg. This typically means</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// VirtReg is live across a call, and PhysReg isn&#39;t call-preserved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aaa3c968c8898b0110e68e4933485c9042"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635aaa3c968c8898b0110e68e4933485c9042">IK&#95;RegMask</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check for interference before assigning VirtReg to PhysReg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this function returns IK&#95;Free, it is legal to assign(VirtReg, PhysReg).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// When there is more than one kind of interference, the InterferenceKind</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// with the highest enum value is returned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635a">InterferenceKind</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ad064f1e4af82a7f4251434afde29b0b5">checkInterference</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;VirtReg,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check for interference in the segment &#91;Start, End) that may prevent</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// assignment to PhysReg. If this function returns true, there is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// interference in the segment &#91;Start, End) of some other interval already</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// assigned to PhysReg. If this function returns false, PhysReg is free at</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the segment &#91;Start, End).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#ad064f1e4af82a7f4251434afde29b0b5">checkInterference</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Start, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> End, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check for interference in the segment &#91;Start, End) that may prevent</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// assignment to PhysReg, like checkInterference. Returns a lane mask of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// which lanes of the physical register interfere in the segment &#91;Start, End)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of some other interval already assigned to PhysReg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If this function returns LaneBitmask::getNone(), PhysReg is completely</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// free at the segment &#91;Start, End).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lanebitmask">LaneBitmask</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#afc6ed60b40c5c63149c23ba327a77c23">checkInterferenceLanes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Start, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> End,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">                                     <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Assign VirtReg to PhysReg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This will mark VirtReg&#39;s live range as occupied in the LiveRegMatrix and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// update VirtRegMap. The live range is expected to be available in PhysReg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix/#aca181a8107cd511dad6c6627fe9f6fae">assign</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp;VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Unassign VirtReg from its PhysReg.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Assuming that VirtReg was previously assigned to a PhysReg, this undoes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the assignment and updates VirtRegMap accordingly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true if the given \\p PhysReg has any live intervals assigned.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
